title: Polygon execution stage failed
body:
version: v2.31.0
start script:
```
./bin/erigon \
        --datadir=./data \
        --chain=bor-mainnet \
        --http.addr=0.0.0.0 \
        --http.port=8545 \
        --http.corsdomain=* \
        --ws \
        --http.vhosts=* \
        --http.api=eth,net,trace,web3,erigon \
        --bor.heimdall https://heimdall.api.matic.network \
        --torrent.download.rate 100mb 
```

After [7/16 Execution] Blocks execution Failed, sync keep failed.
How can I fix this?

Same story with 2.30.0/2.31.0:

```
[INFO] [12-09|19:58:23.659] [txpool] stat                            block=21821700 pending=10000 baseFee=0 queued=30000 alloc=19.9GB sys=24.4GB
[INFO] [12-09|19:58:42.459] [p2p] GoodPeers                          eth66=33 eth67=0

[INFO] [12-09|19:59:22.550] [2/16 Headers] No block headers to write in this log period block number=21821700
[INFO] [12-09|19:59:22.550] Req/resp stats                           req=5505 reqMin=21784989 reqMax=30029886 skel=20 skelMin=21823236 skelMax=22117956 resp=25807 respMin=21785023 respMax=36630742 dups=613137
[INFO] [12-09|19:59:24.121] [txpool] stat                            block=21821700 pending=10000 baseFee=0 queued=30000 alloc=18.6GB sys=24.4GB
````

Don't use
```
        --bor.heimdall https://heimdall.api.matic.network \
```
Last week there was a downtime in the above public API and that would have caused the bad block.
This issue is stale because it has been open for 40 days with no activity. Remove stale label or comment, or this will be closed in 7 days.
This issue was closed because it has been stalled for 7 days with no activity.
